text: The San Marcos Civic Center is a Sprinter light rail station. It is served by North County Transit District. It is on San Marcos Boulevard. == Platforms and tracks == Westbound station Station Station Station Eastbound station Palomar College (toward Oceanside Transit Center) San Marcos Civic Center Cal State San Marcos (toward Escondido Transit Center) ← → == Other websites == *Map of the station on Google Maps Category:North County Transit District stations Category:2008 establishments in California
title: San Marcos Civic Center (NCTD station)
